languages.text: "Вот тут, на корабле, совсем другое дело... да я за первый год на службе у леди фон Валанциус насмотрелась на чудес больше, чем за всю жизнь на Лейре. Взять хотя бы мой первый полет через {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g} — три дня лежала, а в голове сверхновые взрывались! Я только потом узнала, что легко отделалась — за переборкой в соседнем отсеке вся команда превратилась..." {n}Идира осекается.{/n} "Что-то я разболталась, Лорд-капитан. Не берите в голову".

traits.locale_text: "Вот тут, на корабле, совсем другое дело... да я за первый год на службе у леди фон Валанциус насмотрелась на чудес больше, чем за всю жизнь на Лейре. Взять хотя бы мой первый полет через варп — три дня лежала, а в голове сверхновые взрывались! Я только потом узнала, что легко отделалась — за переборкой в соседнем отсеке вся команда превратилась..." {n}Идира осекается.{/n} "Что-то я разболталась, Лорд-капитан. Не берите в голову".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "But here on the ship is a different story altogether... I saw more wonders in my first year serving Lady von Valancius than I'd seen in my whole life on Leira. Like my first journey through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} — I was in bed for three days, I felt like supernovas were exploding in my head! I only found out later that I'd gotten off easy — just through the bulkhead, in the bay next to mine, a whole team turned into—" {n}Idira breaks off.{/n} "Look at me, rambling on, Lord Captain. Pay no attention."
languages.original_text: "Вот тут, на корабле, совсем другое дело... да я за первый год на службе у леди фон Валанциус насмотрелась на чудес больше, чем за всю жизнь на Лейре. Взять хотя бы мой первый полет через {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g} — три дня лежала, а в голове сверхновые взрывались! Я только потом узнала, что легко отделалась — за переборкой в соседнем отсеке вся команда превратилась..." {n}Идира осекается.{/n} "Что-то я разболталась, Лорд-капитан. Не берите в голову".

Like my first jump through the warp — I was in bed for three days, I felt like supernovas were exploding in my head! I only found out later that I'd gotten off easy — just through the bulkhead, in the bay next to mine, a whole team turned into—" {n}Idira breaks off.{/n} "Look at me, rambling on, Lord Captain. Pay no attention."

I only found out later that I'd gotten off easy — just through the bulkhead, in the bay next to mine, a whole team turned into—" {n}Idira breaks off.{/n} "Look at me, rambling on, Lord Captain. Pay no attention."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “但船上的生活就是另一回事了……在我侍奉冯·瓦兰修斯夫人的第一年，我亲眼见到的奇迹，就比在莱拉生活了那么多年见到的还要多。比如说，我第一次穿越{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的时候，我在床上整整躺了三天，当时感觉仿佛超新星在我的脑海中爆炸了一样！直到后来我才发现，那个时候我失控了。就在我隔壁的甲板，就在一墙之隔的地方，所有的船员都变成了——”{n}伊迪拉停了下来。{/n}“看看我，我又开始胡说八道了。别介意，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "But here on the ship is a different story altogether... I saw more wonders in my first year serving Lady von Valancius than I'd seen in my whole life on Leira. Like my first journey through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} — I was in bed for three days, I felt like supernovas were exploding in my head! I only found out later that I'd gotten off easy — just through the bulkhead, in the bay next to mine, a whole team turned into—" {n}Idira breaks off.{/n} "Look at me, rambling on, Lord Captain. Pay no attention."

traits.locale_text: “但船上的生活就是另一回事了……在我侍奉冯·瓦兰修斯夫人的第一年，我亲眼见到的奇迹，就比在莱拉生活了那么多年见到的还要多。比如说，我第一次穿越{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}的时候，我在床上整整躺了三天，当时感觉仿佛超新星在我的脑海中爆炸了一样！直到后来我才发现，那个时候我失控了。就在我隔壁的甲板，就在一墙之隔的地方，所有的船员都变成了——”{n}伊迪拉停了下来。{/n}“看看我，我又开始胡说八道了。别介意，舰长大人。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "But here on the ship is a different story altogether... I saw more wonders in my first year serving Lady von Valancius than I'd seen in my whole life on Leira. Like my first journey through the warp — I was in bed for three days, I felt like supernovas were exploding in my head! I only found out later that I'd gotten off easy — just through the bulkhead, in the bay next to mine, a whole team turned into—" {n}Idira breaks off.{/n} "Look at me, rambling on, Lord Captain. Pay no attention."

languages.text: «Pero aquí, en la nave, es una historia totalmente distinta... Vi más maravillas en mi primer año sirviendo a lady von Valancius de las que había visto en toda mi vida en Leira. Como mi primer viaje por la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}: me pasé tres días en cama; ¡era como si me explotaran supernovas en la cabeza! Descubrí más tarde que había salido bien parada: justo al otro lado de la mampara, en la bahía adyacente a la mía, un equipo entero se convirtió en...». {n}Idira se interrumpe.{/n} «Perdone que sea pesada, Lord Capitán. No me haga caso».
languages.original_text: "But here on the ship is a different story altogether... I saw more wonders in my first year serving Lady von Valancius than I'd seen in my whole life on Leira. Like my first journey through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} — I was in bed for three days, I felt like supernovas were exploding in my head! I only found out later that I'd gotten off easy — just through the bulkhead, in the bay next to mine, a whole team turned into—" {n}Idira breaks off.{/n} "Look at me, rambling on, Lord Captain. Pay no attention."

traits.locale_text: «Pero aquí, en la nave, es una historia totalmente distinta... Vi más maravillas en mi primer año sirviendo a lady von Valancius de las que había visto en toda mi vida en Leira. Como mi primer viaje por la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}: me pasé tres días en cama; ¡era como si me explotaran supernovas en la cabeza! Descubrí más tarde que había salido bien parada: justo al otro lado de la mampara, en la bahía adyacente a la mía, un equipo entero se convirtió en...». {n}Idira se interrumpe.{/n} «Perdone que sea pesada, Lord Capitán. No me haga caso».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「でも、この船では全く別の話よ…レディ・フォン・ヴァランシウスに仕えた最初の1年間は、レイラでの人生で見たよりも多くの驚異を見たわ。初めて{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}を通って旅したときのように…あの時、あたいは3日間ベッドの中に寝たきりで、まるで頭の中で超新星が爆発しているような感覚に陥ったのよ！後で分かったんだけど、あたいは真っ先に逃げ出してたの。隔壁の向こう、あたいの部屋の隣のベイでは、チーム全員が…」{n}イディラは言葉を切った。{/n}「見てよ、あたい、話し続けるでしょ、ロード・キャプテン。何も気にしないでちょうだい」
languages.original_text: "But here on the ship is a different story altogether... I saw more wonders in my first year serving Lady von Valancius than I'd seen in my whole life on Leira. Like my first journey through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} — I was in bed for three days, I felt like supernovas were exploding in my head! I only found out later that I'd gotten off easy — just through the bulkhead, in the bay next to mine, a whole team turned into—" {n}Idira breaks off.{/n} "Look at me, rambling on, Lord Captain. Pay no attention."

traits.locale_text: 「でも、この船では全く別の話よ…レディ・フォン・ヴァランシウスに仕えた最初の1年間は、レイラでの人生で見たよりも多くの驚異を見たわ。初めて{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}を通って旅したときのように…あの時、あたいは3日間ベッドの中に寝たきりで、まるで頭の中で超新星が爆発しているような感覚に陥ったのよ！後で分かったんだけど、あたいは真っ先に逃げ出してたの。隔壁の向こう、あたいの部屋の隣のベイでは、チーム全員が…」{n}イディラは言葉を切った。{/n}「見てよ、あたい、話し続けるでしょ、ロード・キャプテン。何も気にしないでちょうだい」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Doch hier auf dem Schiff ist das etwas völlig anderes ... Ich habe in meinem ersten Jahr in Diensten von Lady von Valancius mehr gesehen als zuvor in meinem gesamten Leben auf Leira. Meine erste Reise durch den {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} beispielsweise — ich lag drei Tage lang im Bett. Es fühlte sich an, als würden in meinem Kopf Supernovae explodieren! Ich habe erst später erfahren, dass ich noch glimpflich davongekommen bin — auf der anderen Seite des Schotts, im Raum neben mir, wurde ein ganzes Team in ..." {n}Idira verstummt.{/n} "Ach, ich schwafle viel zu viel, Lord Captain. Beachtet mich gar nicht."
languages.original_text: "But here on the ship is a different story altogether... I saw more wonders in my first year serving Lady von Valancius than I'd seen in my whole life on Leira. Like my first journey through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} — I was in bed for three days, I felt like supernovas were exploding in my head! I only found out later that I'd gotten off easy — just through the bulkhead, in the bay next to mine, a whole team turned into—" {n}Idira breaks off.{/n} "Look at me, rambling on, Lord Captain. Pay no attention."

traits.locale_text: "Doch hier auf dem Schiff ist das etwas völlig anderes ... Ich habe in meinem ersten Jahr in Diensten von Lady von Valancius mehr gesehen als zuvor in meinem gesamten Leben auf Leira. Meine erste Reise durch den {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} beispielsweise — ich lag drei Tage lang im Bett. Es fühlte sich an, als würden in meinem Kopf Supernovae explodieren! Ich habe erst später erfahren, dass ich noch glimpflich davongekommen bin — auf der anderen Seite des Schotts, im Raum neben mir, wurde ein ganzes Team in ..."{n}Idira verstummt.{/n} "Ach, ich schwafle viel zu viel, Lord Captain. Beachtet mich gar nicht."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Alors qu'ici, sur ce vaisseau, c'est autre chose... J'ai vu plus de merveilles lors de ma première année au service de dame von Valancius qu'au cours de toute ma vie sur Leira. Comme mon premier voyage à travers le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. J'ai dû garder le lit pendant trois jours, j'avais l'impression que des supernovas explosaient dans ma tête ! J'ai appris plus tard que j'avais eu de la chance : de l'autre côté de la cloison, dans la baie voisine, toute une équipe s'était transformée en... » {n}Idira s'interrompt.{/n} « Mais je radote, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ne faites pas attention. »
languages.original_text: "But here on the ship is a different story altogether... I saw more wonders in my first year serving Lady von Valancius than I'd seen in my whole life on Leira. Like my first journey through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} — I was in bed for three days, I felt like supernovas were exploding in my head! I only found out later that I'd gotten off easy — just through the bulkhead, in the bay next to mine, a whole team turned into—" {n}Idira breaks off.{/n} "Look at me, rambling on, Lord Captain. Pay no attention."

traits.locale_text: « Alors qu'ici, sur ce vaisseau, c'est autre chose... J'ai vu plus de merveilles lors de ma première année au service de dame von Valancius qu'au cours de toute ma vie sur Leira. Comme mon premier voyage à travers le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. J'ai dû garder le lit pendant trois jours, j'avais l'impression que des supernovas explosaient dans ma tête ! J'ai appris plus tard que j'avais eu de la chance : de l'autre côté de la cloison, dans la baie voisine, toute une équipe s'était transformée en... » {n}Idira s'interrompt.{/n} « Mais je radote, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ne faites pas attention. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ancak bu gemide yaşadıklarım bambaşka bir hikâye. Leydi von Valancius'un hizmetindeki ilk senemde, Leira'da geçirdiğim onca yılda görmediğimden daha fazla keramete şahit oldum. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyuta{/g} ilk yolculuğum mesela. Üç gün yataktan çıkamadım. Sanki kafamda süpernovalar patlıyordu! Sonradan öğrendim ki ucuz yırtmışım. Meğer yanı başımdaki bölmede duran tüm mürettebat, âdeta..." {n}İdira duraksıyor.{/n} "Gene saçmalamaya başladım Lord Kaptan. Sen bana aldırma."
languages.original_text: "But here on the ship is a different story altogether... I saw more wonders in my first year serving Lady von Valancius than I'd seen in my whole life on Leira. Like my first journey through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} — I was in bed for three days, I felt like supernovas were exploding in my head! I only found out later that I'd gotten off easy — just through the bulkhead, in the bay next to mine, a whole team turned into—" {n}Idira breaks off.{/n} "Look at me, rambling on, Lord Captain. Pay no attention."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak bu gemide yaşadıklarım bambaşka bir hikâye. Leydi von Valancius'un hizmetine geçtiğim ilk yılda bile Leira'da geçirdiğim yıllarıma kıyasla çok daha fazla harikaya şahit oldum. Tıpkı {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g}a ilk yolculuğum gibi... Üç gün boyunca yataklara düşmüştüm. Sanki kafamın içinde yıldızlar patlıyordu! Sonradan öğrendim ki ben çok kolay kurtulmuştum. Bölme panelinden geçince, hemen yanı başımdaki bölmede yer alan tüm mürettebat, âdeta..." {n}İdira duraksıyor.{/n} "Baksana Lord Kaptan, boş boş konuşup duruyorum. Sen bana aldırma."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
